name: 100 Kilometri
overview: A weird idea around bike racing, using 'Trashman' graphics on the first and last part. The keys are: Q-speed up A-speed down P-change leader If you keep the speed around 30 and keep the P key pressed all the way thru the game, you reach the end with no problems. I advise you to use the emulators full speed option. Or be prepared to fall asleep at the wheel... I mean handlebar! I mean keyboard!
